title: Tasty Oven Baked ( Juicy Baked ) Fried Chicken Recipe
content:
Healthy crispy fried chicken which actually tastes like fried chicken. It is healthier and is more juicer than normal ones. Serve it with a side salad and you are good to go.

 

Oven-Baked Fried Chicken Recipe

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 45 mins

Total time: 55 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: American

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

Chicken - 1 whole chicken cut into 10 pieces

Dried Basil - 1 tablespoon

Dried Oregano -1 tablespoon

Cayenne Powder - 1 teaspoon

Garlic Powder - 1 tablespoon

Onion Powder - 1 tablespoon

Salt to taste

Red Chilli Flakes - 1 tablespoon

Oil - 2 tablespoon

Breadcrumbs - 1 cup

Egg - 2

 

Instructions

Take all spices and salt in a bowl and mix well.

Take chicken in a bowl, add half of the seasoning mix in the chicken and mix well.

Take breadcrumbs in a bowl and add the remaining half of the spices in it.

Beat eggs in a bowl.

Take chicken and dip in egg, coat in breadcrumbs and arrange in a foil-lined baking pan.

Drizzle little oil over the chicken.

Pop it in a 200-degree c, preheated oven for 45 mins.

Remove and serve it.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
